content: 1) Listening to today’s testimony and seeing the previously unseen footage as it was narrated by the witnesses was gut wrenching. I felt myself reliving the trauma of being trapped in the gallery on January 6. n.pr/3zHODSB
name: Henry C. "Hank" Johnson, Jr.
text: listening todays testimony seeing previously unseen footage narrated witnesses gut wrenching felt reliving trauma trapped gallery january npr3zhodsb

content:
2) But more than my own trauma, I felt the ongoing trauma of the officers who testified. My words are inadequate to express the degree of hurt that I feel for them & what they continue to go through every day to protect me and my colleagues.      
n.pr/3zHODSB
name: Henry C. "Hank" Johnson, Jr.
text: trauma felt ongoing trauma officers testified words inadequate express degree hurt feel continue go every day protect colleagues npr3zhodsb

content: 3) Those officers successfully stood between a terrorist mob and tyranny. n.pr/3zHODSB
name: Henry C. "Hank" Johnson, Jr.
text: officers successfully stood terrorist mob tyranny npr3zhodsb
